dt: {bc}the act or an instance of {a_link|donating}: such as
{bc}the making of a gift especially to a charity or public institution

et: Middle English {it}donatyowne{/it}, from Latin {it}donation-, donatio{/it}, from {it}donare{/it} to present, from {it}donum{/it} gift; akin to Latin {it}dare{/it} to give {ma}{mat|date|}{/ma}
shortdef: the act or an instance of donating: such as
the making of a gift especially to a charity or public institution

dt: {bc}to give something to help a person, a cause, etc. {bc}make a contribution

dt.t: Would you like to {it}make a donation{/it} to the library fund?

shortdef: to give something to help a person, a cause, etc. : make a contribution
